resources.string: What would you like to do?
where in Spain would you like to travel?
Where would you like to travel?

Barcelona is the country’s second city but it is Spain’s most popular destination for international visitors. It is a laid-back city which offers stunning coastlines combined with a wide range of things to see and do. The city is synonymous with Antoni Gaudí, the architect whose other-worldly structures attract millions of visitors each year. The Sagrada Familia is the most famous and most extravagant and no one should miss a chance to visit the jaw-dropping church. Other highlights include the Fundación de Joan Miro, Camp Nou (Barcelona F.C.’s stadium), Montjuic, and the Picasso Museum.

The essence of luxury travel, this sumptuous five-star hotel is ideally located right in the heart of Barcelona and connects guests with the very best of the city’s cultural charms. Seamless service paired with a wealth of refined dining and leisure facilities makes for a thoroughly indulgent stay.
